entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
